channel.title: Suddenly Logging you out?
channel.description: This is really strange... All of a sudden, people get connection lost when trying to trade the smithing store or try to farm... I haven't edited them at all, so what could be the problem?

item.title: Suddenly Logging you out?
item.dc:creator: @zubmage zubmage
item.description:
@zubmage wrote:

Si Force, for the 6 weeks that shops been open, those silab id’s haven’t done anything to it.

Graham, so what you are saying is that I can’t have the “-1” here?

parseIncomingPackets(); packetType = -1; } catch (java.lang.Exception __ex) { __ex.printStackTrace(); disconnected = true; System.out.println("pimpscape Server [fatal] - exception"); } return true; }

Read full topic

item.title: Suddenly Logging you out?
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

You have silab id’s in the code,

Remove them.

They’re skillcape ones.

Read full topic

item.title: Suddenly Logging you out?
item.dc:creator: @Graham Graham
item.description:
@Graham wrote:

You are trying to access the index -107 in an array. Arrays can’t have negative indexes. You’ll need to check I expect eg:

if(index > 0 && index < array.size) {
// do something with array[index]
} else {
System.out.println("Cannot access index " + index);
}

Read full topic

item.title: Suddenly Logging you out?
item.dc:creator: @zubmage zubmage
item.description:
@zubmage wrote:

Wait, I got this in Runserver at the time of disconnection:

java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -107
        at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:19994)
        at client.packetProcess(client.java:18582)
        at client.packetSending(client.java:18535)
        at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:153)
        at server.main(server.java:49)
pimpscape Server [fatal] - exception
Game saved for player Zubmage
ClientHandler: Client Zubmage disconnected.

Read full topic

item.title: Suddenly Logging you out?
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

Look for any silabsoft id’s and remove them and see,

If there isn’t any i don’t know.

Read full topic

item.title: Suddenly Logging you out?
item.dc:creator: @zubmage zubmage
item.description:
@zubmage wrote:

Old ID?

This is what it looks like:

[code]shop = 38 Smithing Store 2 2 2349 1000 2351 1000 2353 1000 2355 1000 2357 1000 2359 1000 2361 1000 2363 1000 2366 15 2368 15 434 10000 436 10000 438 10000 440 10000 442 10000 444 10000 447 10000 449 10000 451 10000 453 10000

        } else if (NPCID == 549) { //
            PutNPCCoords = true;
            WanneShop = 38; // Smithing Store[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Suddenly Logging you out?
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

You probably have a “Silab Item” in the shop and
its probably an old id so your server or client will not support
it and therefore disconnects you.

Read full topic

item.title: Suddenly Logging you out?
item.dc:creator: @zubmage zubmage
item.description:
@zubmage wrote:

Yes. 549 is the NPC, wanneshop == 38. Also, the wanneshop is the same as the one in shops.cfg. There is no other 549NPC.

Read full topic

item.title: Suddenly Logging you out?
item.dc:creator: @Graham Graham
item.description:
@Graham wrote:

I’ve noticed that when the client gets a bad packet it mostly will just disconnect without reporting any error. You may be sending a malformed packet.

Read full topic

item.title: Suddenly Logging you out?
item.dc:creator: @xRedemptionx xRedemptionx
item.description:
@xRedemptionx wrote:

Zubmage, do those NPCs have Wanneshops?

Read full topic

item.title: Suddenly Logging you out?
item.dc:creator: @zubmage zubmage
item.description:
@zubmage wrote:

  1. Yes it did work before, I didn’t edit anything and it just suddenly stopped :S
  2. Redemption, no the shop does not open, it just disconnects you.
  3. Eviltwin1, the shop was always a right-click-trade, also I’ve tried just talking to him.

Read full topic

item.title: Suddenly Logging you out?
item.dc:creator: @eviltwin1 eviltwin1
item.description:
@eviltwin1 wrote:

well with certain shops u cant click trade u need to clikc talk. also if ur shop contains an item that may be silab and ur using a mopar client or a client that doesnt support that item it will cause them to log out

Read full topic

item.title: Suddenly Logging you out?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

I odnt know how to fix, but i do think that its because its not added, try talking to them, and making the store say: TALK TO ME NOT TRADE or something. but most likely dont trade and just talk to them.

Read full topic
